Name: Thug Life
About the game: The movie focuses on a morning in the life of a notorious gang leader, as his daily activities are finally interrupted by a police counterattack. Fight your way out of extreme odds and become a legend. Realistic gun handling featuring a colt 1911, AK and a Pump shotgun. Hold and load magazines in and out, pump the shotgun and pull sliders. Realistically rendered world with PBR materials featuring city locations both outside and inside buildings. Environments include destructible assets and target shooting opportunities.
Meta Title: Thug Life: Dec 20, 2017, U24 Solutions and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Thug Life? Check out the release date (Dec 20, 2017), developer insights from U24 Solutions, and a complete game summary.
